features.title: Failing e2e tests
features.description:
The tests in rejection are failing - make sure to fix them.
If something is wrong with the code that results in their failure, make sure to document it in a file `docs/TEST_EXPLANATION.md`.
features.rejection: Blocked: One failing test assertion is logically contradictory and cannot be satisfied: in tests/e2e/documents-hybrid-advanced.e2e.test.ts (w=0.5), it asserts both bestTitle <= 0 and worstContent < bestTitle. With 0-based indexing, if bestTitle is 0, worstContent cannot be < 0. I implemented code changes to fix the other failures (tie-breakers, entity title boost, src in FTS/literal) and documented the contradiction and proposed fix in docs/TEST_EXPLANATION.md. Please update the test accordingly to proceed.

features.title: Failing e2e tests keep shifting
features.description:
The tests in rejection are failing - because their results keep moving around even though the files are not changing.
If something is wrong with the code that results in their failure, make sure to document it in a file `docs/TESTS_E2E_EXPLANATION.md`.
